ml.title: Machine Learning Projects
ml.subtitle: AI models, data pipelines, and intelligent systems I've built

p1.title: COVID-19 Chest X-Ray Detector
p1.description: A deep learning pipeline for binary classification of COVID-19 vs Normalchest X-rays.

p2.title: Medical Image Classifier
p2.description: Deep learning model using EfficientNet-B4 for classifying chest X-rays into 14 pathological conditions. Trained on 112K images with attention-guided Grad-CAM visualizations.

p3.title: Recommendation System
p3.description: Hybrid collaborative-content filtering engine for e-commerce. Combines matrix factorization with deep embeddings to deliver personalized product recommendations to 50K+ users.

p4.title: Time Series Forecaster
p4.description: Stock price prediction model using Temporal Fusion Transformers. Processes 15 years of OHLCV data with multi-horizon forecasting and interpretable attention weights.

web.title: Full Stack Web Projects
web.subtitle: Modern web applications and APIs I've designed and developed

p1.title: E-Commerce Platform
p1.description: Full-featured marketplace built with Next.js, Stripe payments, PostgreSQL, and Redis caching. Supports multi-vendor storefronts, real-time inventory, and admin dashboards.

p2.title: Real-Time Chat Application
p2.description: WebSocket-powered messaging platform with end-to-end encryption, file sharing, and video calls. Built with React, Node.js, Socket.io, and MongoDB.

p3.title: Project Management Tool
p3.description: Kanban-style project tracker with drag-and-drop, real-time collaboration, Gantt charts, and sprint planning. Architected with Next.js, tRPC, and Prisma.

p4.title: Analytics Dashboard
p4.description: Interactive business intelligence dashboard with dynamic charts, PDF report generation, and role-based access control. Built with React, D3.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.
